column5: Picked up a 2012 Arctic Cat TZ1 LXR 1100 ( no turbo ). It's my first sled since my '87 Safari 377 . So far , I'm loving it ?
Nice!!!
Thanks !!! and Thanks  I already put 385kms on it
Awesome! Sweet ride!
Nice ride!
Beauty! Braaaaaaaap!  S.
FYI Getting it stuck will suck!! I see it weighs the same as my Yamaha RS Venture GT. Carry a shovel!!!
I'm dreading the day ! I have my 100' track winch rope ready , a shovel and matches . I'm not planning on boondocking , but I'm sure it's going to happen , I'll make it a point to never do it alone
Sweet trail machine!  Must ride beautifully
Probably a little different than the old 377 eh?  It's not my style but it's definitely a sweet sled.
Nice sled Randy!  How's the ice on Nipissing?  Have you been out to the islands yet?
Randy, sweet, sweet ,sweet  Looks like it just came out of the showroom, love the storage at the back  Great score  Enjoy
beauty cruiser, stay outta the pow!
Smooth as silk and great on gas !

Quite the difference from a Safari 377 , wasn't what I was really looking for , but I couldn't go wrong with the price , 2900kms , 700$ worth of helmets ( new in box I got to pick ) 200$ with of mitts , new .. 2016 trail pass , full tank of gas + 40$ gas card , 6800$ .... bought for 17000 $ new .
Wormdunker , I'm staying off Nipissing for now , 9" in some places but 1" in others , not many people have ventured out yet ... I'll be patient a little longer .
be sledding your way soon either on my apex or on the new zr9000 turbo el tigre if i get it soon
Cool , lemme know when !
You don't need to be a sled guy to know that's beauty of a head turner. $17000.00? Wowza. Congrats Sir nice ride.
Not me , I paid 6800$
Ya you got a helluva deal for that sled, hopefully it doesn't have any of those AC electrical gremlins
Apparently the gremlins were killed off in 2011
